article.description: Mike Cunningham scored a career high 23 points and collected nine rebounds as South Carolina-Upstate beat Lipscomb 92-91 in overtime Saturday.
article.headline: SC-Upstate subdues Lipscomb 92-91 in OT
article.story: NASHVILLE, Tenn. -- Mike Cunningham scored a career high 23 points and collected nine rebounds as South Carolina-Upstate beat Lipscomb 92-91 in overtime Saturday. Cunningham's jumper with 3:39 to play in OT put SC-Upstate (8-16, 2-5 Atlantic Sun) on top for good at 80-78. J.C. Hampton's layup reduced Lipscomb's deficit to 90-88 with 13 seconds left. SC-Upstate's Josh Cuthbertson went to the free throw line but missed a pair. Hampton-who finished with 17 points- drove the lane but lost the ball out of bounds with three seconds remaining. At the end of regulation, Nathan Moran made three free throws after getting fouled on a 3-point shot attempt with a second left to tie it at 76. Six seconds prior, Moran made two of three free throws-again after getting fouled on a 3-attempt-to reduce Lipscomb's (7-17, 3-4) deficit to 74-73. Cunningham made two free throws with four seconds left for a 76-73 lead.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
